titles.title: A bill to extend for five years the existing temporary duty-free treatment of hosiery knitting machines, and double-headed latch needles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1990, the duty-free treatment of certain hosiery knitting machines and double-headed latch needles.
